item.title: FH classic v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 29, 2025

FH classic v1.0 ETS2

You’re asking about the FH Classic in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)! This refers to a popular mod that brings the older generation of the Volvo FH (often called the FH1, FH12, or FH16 Classic, produced from 1993 to around 2012) into the game.

What is the FH Classic Mod?
The official ETS2 game primarily features the newer Volvo FH models. The FH Classic mod fills a gap for players who love the look and feel of the earlier, iconic Volvo FH trucks. These mods are typically community-made and offer a highly detailed and customizable version of the “old gen” FH.
Key Features You Can Expect
While features can vary between different creators and versions of the FH Classic mod, you’ll generally find:

Detailed Model: A meticulously crafted exterior and interior, aiming for a high level of realism, often with accurate textures and animations.
Ownable Truck: You can purchase this truck from a mod dealer in the game, allowing you to fully customize and add it to your fleet.
Extensive Customization: This is a big draw for truck mods. Expect a wide range of options, including:
Chassis Options: Various configurations like 4×2, 6×2, 6×4, and sometimes even 8×4.
Engine & Transmission Choices: A selection of engines with different power outputs and numerous gearbox options to match various driving styles and cargo weights.
Cabin Types: Different cabin heights and lengths (e.g., Globetrotter, XL, L2H1, L2H2).
External Accessories: A plethora of tuning parts like custom bumpers, grills, lights, spoilers, side skirts, mudguards, and various chrome or paintable parts.
Interior Customization: Options for different interior trim levels, custom steering wheels, additional gauges, and interior decorations.
Custom Sounds: Many high-quality FH Classic mods include realistic engine sounds, air brake sounds, and horn sounds that are sampled from the actual trucks, greatly enhancing immersion.
Skins/Paint Jobs: Support for custom paint jobs, sometimes including real-world company liveries or unique designs.

Why is it Popular?
The FH Classic holds a special place for many truck enthusiasts and ETS2 players due to its:

Nostalgia Factor: It’s a beloved truck from a bygone era for many.
Distinctive Look: It has a unique, robust, and classic design that stands out from modern trucks.
Versatility: In real life, it was a workhorse, and mods often reflect this by offering many chassis and engine options suitable for various hauling tasks.

How to install:

Download the .scs File: Mods usually come as a .scs file (or sometimes a .zip archive containing one or more .scs files).

Place in Mod Folder:

  • Go to your “Documents” folder.
  • Find the “Euro Truck Simulator 2” folder.
  • Inside, there should be a “mod” folder. If not, create it.
  • The path is typically: Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod.
  • Copy the downloaded .scs file(s) into this mod folder.

Activate in Game:

  • Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
  • On the profile selection screen, click on Mod Manager.
  • Find the “FH Classic” mod (or whatever its specific name appears as) in the left panel.
  • Double-click it or use the arrow to move it to the Active Mods list on the right.
  • Mod Order: Always check the mod’s download page for any specific load order instructions, as some mods need to be placed higher or lower in the list to work correctly.
  • Click Confirm Changes.
  • Load your game profile.
  • Purchase In-Game: Once your game loads, visit an in-game Truck Dealer (it might be listed as a “Mod Dealer” or simply the Volvo dealer, depending on the mod’s setup) to purchase and customize your new FH Classic.

Important Notes:

  • Compatibility: Always check if the mod is compatible with your current version of ETS2. Game updates often require modders to update their creations.
  • Conflicts: Running many mods can sometimes lead to conflicts or crashes. If you encounter issues, try disabling other mods to see if the problem persists.
  • Performance: Highly detailed mods can occasionally impact game performance, especially on less powerful PCs.

Do you have a favorite version of the FH Classic mod you’re looking for, or any other questions about getting it set up?

Credits: WHALA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: NIELSON DIPLOMATA 380 VOLVO ETS2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 29, 2025

NIELSON DIPLOMATA 380 VOLVO ETS2 v1.0 ETS2

The Nielson Diplomata 380 Volvo is a popular bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). This mod allows players to drive a detailed representation of the Nielson Diplomata 380 bus, often with a Volvo chassis.

Common features of the mod include:
Detailed Modeling: The bus is generally well-modeled, both on the exterior and interior, with attention to detail in the driver’s cab and passenger lounge.
Animations: Many mods of this type include functional animations for doors, luggage racks, pedals, and even the ignition key.
Skins/Paint Jobs: The mod usually comes with a variety of skins (paint jobs) from real or fictional bus companies, and often allows for the creation of custom skins.
Engines and Transmissions: Offers Volvo engine and transmission options, allowing players to customize the bus’s performance.
Realistic Sounds: The mod may include custom sounds for the engine, horn, and other elements, increasing immersion.
Compatibility: It is important to check which version of ETS2 the mod is compatible with, as game updates can affect the functionality of mods. Versions 1.47, 1.48, 1.50, 1.53, and 1.54 have been mentioned in recent videos.
Passengers: Some mods allow you to add passengers inside the bus and luggage in the luggage compartments, making the transportation experience more realistic.

To install a mod in ETS2, the general process is as follows:
1. Download: Download the mod file (usually a .scs file).
2. Move to Mods Folder: Copy the .scs file to the “mod” folder of your Euro Truck Simulator 2 game. The typical path is: `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
3. Activate in Mod Manager: Start Euro Truck Simulator 2, go to the “Mod Manager” in your game profile, and activate the Nielson Diplomata 380 Volvo mod. Make sure the order of the mods is correct if you have other mods installed.
4. Purchase in Game: After activating, you will usually need to go to a truck dealership (or bus dealership, if the mod adds one) in the game to purchase the bus.

It is always recommended to check the specific instructions provided by the mod creator, as there may be additional requirements or installation details.

Credits: PIRATEIRO GAME & EQUIPE

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH12 Generation v1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 29, 2025

Volvo FH12 Generation v1.55 ETS2

– 1 cabin Globetrotter
– 2 4×2 and 6×2/4 chassis liftable and steerable axle.
– Own wheels, FMOD, tuning components.
– 3 trailers: reefer Lamberet Futura SR2, Parcisa food tank & Kassbohrer curtainsider Maxima XS skin.
– Skinnable, included 4K template.
– Support of advanced coupling, animation window & trailer cables.

Credits: Nikola
